dict.string:
Key points - The app does not store or request any personal information - The app does not send any data to MPD Bailey Technology or to a third party - The app contains no advertisements. - The app does not contain any analytics or tracking.
You can view the full privacy policy here: https://pigdogbay.blogspot.com/2023/12/privacy-policy.html
For further information contact mpdbailey.technology@gmail.com
